Plot: After a vicious attacks leaves him brain-damaged and broke, Mark Hogancamp seeks recovery in "Marwencol", a 1/6th scale World War II-era town he creates in his backyard.
Title: Marwencol
Actors: Mark Hogancamp, Emmanuel Nneji, Edda Hogancamp, Tom Neubauer
tomatoConsensus: Inspiring and fascinating, Marwencol depicts its subject with heartfelt tenderness, raising poignant questions about art and personal tragedy along the way.
